body:
It seems the last update of `flake8` removed support for python 2.6  : 

```
File "/home/travis/virtualenv/python2.6.9/lib/python2.6/site-packages/flake8/utils.py", line 287, in parameters_for
    parameters = collections.OrderedDict([
AttributeError: 'module' object has no attribute 'OrderedDict'
```

which makes all the tests failing since yesterday. What if we run flake8 checks only for python2.7 ?
title: qa : issues with flake8 update and OrderedDict
